grade_comment:
Grade: 20

Comment: While it is understandable to acknowledge limitations in knowledge, as a student engaging with the topic of the Bible, it is important to at least attempt an answer. In this case, a basic understanding of the concepts of 'soul' and 'spirit' in the Bible could have been reflected upon or researched to provide a more substantial response. It is essential to delve into the subject matter, especially when responding to questions related to religious texts, even if one is not an expert in theology.
